headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Northrop Grumman (NOC) After Its Recent Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Northrop Grumman at around US$727.73 is fairly priced, expensive, or still offering value, you are in the right place. The stock has posted returns of 3.8% over the past week, 8.1% over the past month, 24.3% year to date, 61.1% over 1 year and 164.1% over 5 years, which can change how investors think about both its growth potential and risk. Recent news coverage around Northrop Grumman has focused on its role as a major U.S. defense contractor and its exposure to...
